backend/main.mo: Defines data models and access‑controlled actor methods for vehicle inspections, detailed inspection records, user profiles, and related storage maps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking camera-related requirements to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides brief descriptions of key frontend files and their roles in the inspection workflow and UI.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, icons, and loading the React bundle.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and startup configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Simple service worker enabling basic PWA caching with passthrough fetch behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, page routing, and layout with header, footer, and theming.
frontend/src/components/camera/CameraDia: Displays expandable camera diagnostics showing API availability and last camera error details.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with user menu, logout handling, navigation, and PWA install logic based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/preInspection/Ac: Manages editable lists of electrical and non-electrical accessories with add, update, and remove functionality.
frontend/src/components/preInspection/Gl: Provides a table to edit glass status entries, toggle safety/broken states, and add default glass items.
frontend/src/components/preInspection/Pa: Renders a parts checklist table allowing status selection, remarks entry, and adding default parts.
frontend/src/components/preInspection/Ye: Simple yes/no radio field component with a label and boolean state callback.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, identity loading, and status tracking using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Custom hook that captures the beforeinstallprompt event and exposes whether the app is installable and a method to trigger the install prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to call backend actor methods for creating inspections, saving forms, adding photos, and fetching inspection data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup file defining CSS variables for light and dark themes along with base styling overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, applying QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard UI showing shortcuts to start inspections, view reports, install the app, and display user inspection summaries.
frontend/src/pages/InstallHelpPage.tsx: Displays PWA installation instructions for Android Chrome and clarifies that an APK cannot be generated.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that collects a mobile number and triggers Internet Identity login while showing validation and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/PdfPreviewPage.tsx: Loads inspection data, validates it, and renders a PDF preview with options to generate and download the report. Manages stored photos and prints the formatted HTML content in a new window.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoCapturePage.tsx: Handles camera access, photo capture with metadata, and location permissions for an inspection. Manages camera readiness, saving photos, and navigation between steps.
frontend/src/pages/PreInspectionFormPage: Loads and edits pre‑inspection form data including checklists, accessories, and declarations. Saves the form and proceeds to the photo capture step.
frontend/src/pages/RemarksPage.tsx: Collects and saves inspection remarks with character counting and navigation to the PDF preview. Allows skipping or submitting remarks.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Displays the user's list of inspection reports with loading and error states. Allows navigating to the PDF preview for a selected report.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailsPage.ts: React form page for entering vehicle and customer details, validating inputs, and creating a detailed inspection before navigating to the next step.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on window load and logs registration success or failure.
frontend/src/utils/preInspectionSchema.t: Exports default parts and glass lists used as baseline items for pre‑inspection checklists.
frontend/src/utils/reportValidation.ts: Validates a detailed inspection report, returning missing or invalid field errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration with theme extensions, OKLCH color tokens, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the app’s architecture, workflow, PWA support, and known issues.
